narrative.title: 15 Panzer Division - 1942Q3

operations.name: First Battle of El Alamein
operations.role: Defensive operations on El Alamein line
operations.outcome: Success - held line against British attacks

operations.name: Battle of Alam Halfa
operations.role: Led main attack to south, turned north through British minefields toward Alam Halfa ridge
operations.outcome: Failure - Reached ridge 1 September, forced to withdraw when fuel ran short. Von Vaerst ordered pullback as night fell.

situation.combat_effectiveness: Good but hamstrung by logistics. Division had excellent tactical skills and equipment (Panzer IV F2 destroyed British tanks at long range). However, critical fuel shortage forced withdrawal from Alam Halfa after reaching objective. Fuel crisis and bad terrain undermined offensive.
notable_engagements: Battle of Alam Halfa - main attack (30 Aug - 7 Sept 1942)

narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.
